summary:
Armor set based on soul gems. This armor is exclusive to male characters
You can find the chest containing the armor near The Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood.
In bonus, you have a sword and a staff.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Century Gothic][size=6][color=#5F497A][b]Soul Master Armor[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[color=#CCC1D9][color=#CCC1D9][size=3][font=Century Gothic]Origin of the armor:

I developed this armor for a bigger project with two internet pals. The project was supposed to be a big mod to put down a group of bad necromancers.Â This mod contained new locations, characters with spoken dialogues and quests. Finally, the mod has never been released for some reason beyond our control. The armor and the weapons were the final loot owned by necromancers chief.

Thanks to Glowbow11 and MagnusMac


This present mod contains only the armor set based on soul gems and this one is exclusive for male characters
You can find the chest containing the armor near The Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood or you can forge the armor but you will need filled black soul gems and filled grand soul gems.
The armor set includes :
Soul Master Cuirass
Soul Master Gauntlets
Soul Master Boots
Soul Master Helm
Soul Master Sword with Soul Trap Magic
Staff of W[/font]orms (Re[/size]animate dread zombie)[/color][/color]
author: davjes
